title: SET_ALL_RANDOM_PEDS_FLEE
content:
0x056E0FE8534C29490x49EAE968// SetAllRandomPedsFlee
void SET_ALL_RANDOM_PEDS_FLEE(Player player, BOOL toggle);Parameters:player: The Player ID for whom you want to set this behavior.toggle: true/false.Sets whether all random peds will run away from the player if they are agitated (threatened) (bool=true), or if they will stand their ground (bool=false).
codeBlocks:
// SetAllRandomPedsFlee
void SET_ALL_RANDOM_PEDS_FLEE(Player player, BOOL toggle);

local player = source
-- Example usage for SET_ALL_RANDOM_PEDS_FLEE
SetAllRandomPedsFlee(player, true)
